root.name: Mummy: Tomb of the Pharaoh
root.description: PlotA mining site in Alexandria, Egypt, has ceased operations due to the discovery of an ancient chest covered in hieroglyphics the miners are convinced is cursed. As a facilitator for the National Mining Corporation, you are sent to meet up with the camp's Chief of Mining Operations, Stuart Davenport, and investigate the rumors of spirits in the mine. Once there, you are briefed on the situation by Davenport, and are assured everything is fine. However, your own investigating leads you to discover there is truth to the miners' fears, and that you may not be able to trust everyone you meet at the site.System requirementsOS: Dos 5.0/Windows 3.1/Windows 95.CPU: 50MHzRAM: 8MBHard Drive: 22MB of free space Also requires Quicktime 2.11
